item.description:
Friday, March 9, 2012, 7:00 PM

Hosted by: Organic Garden Cafe and LPF Studio (3 doors down from the Cafe). Come to the OG Cafe before the show for dinner!

Meet at 6pm for Dinner or Dine after the show (be seated by 9pm): While the showtime is 7pm consider the meetup time to begin at 6pm if you want a full meal at the cafe with group members.
 

Friday March 9th at 7pm @ LPF STUDIO*

A Friday 9pm Show has been added!!  Call 978/922-0004 for Tickets


* LPF STUDIO 296A Cabot Street,Beverly, MA 01915 http://www.lpfstudio.com/cinema/

LPF Studio is a production studio for video and still photography, a fine art gallery, and a venue for film screenings equipped with a giant 130" screen, digital projection and digital surround sound.


Order your tickets: From our Shopping Cart OR from the OG Cafe 978/922-0004 $8 in advance ($9 at the door if any tickets are left). We'll hold em for you at the cafe. Reserve before they sell out!

"Forks over Knives!" will be an exciting evening in an intimate theater with lots of other like-minded folk. This is also a Raw and Vegetarian Meetup Group Night.

"WARNING: This movie could save your life."
item.name: Forks over Knives March 9th Showing at Organic Garden Cafe/LPF Studios
